mapper.select: select board_number, board_start_date, board_title, board_category, board_way, board_recruit_number, board_period, board_views, user_nickname, user_file from tbl_user u join tbl_board b on u.user_number = b.user_number WHERE board_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent}, '%')

select ts.skill_file from tbl_board b inner join tbl_board_skill tbs on b.board_number = tbs.board_number inner join tbl_skill ts on tbs.skill_number = ts.skill_number where b.board_number = #{boardNumber};
